gift_source:
::MC4::
Which statement best describes the relationship between image processing and computer vision?
{
= Image processing often supports computer vision tasks
~ They are completely unrelated
~ Image processing is always more advanced
~ Computer vision is only hardware
}
title: MC4
question: Which statement best describes the relationship between image processing and computer vision?

choices.text: Image processing often supports computer vision tasks
Image processing is always more advanced

Common approach for solving vision problems
